EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Webinar_Cloud Native Journey_Q415.Reminder - Day Before
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: You are registered for tomorrow's webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See you tomorrow for our Cloud Native Journey Webinar. Please see event details below.
Date: Wednesday, November 25, 2015 Time: 10:30 AM Mumbai / 1:00 PM Singapore / 4:00 PM Sydney Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. Join the session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1093868/539290F4CEF16CF2734AFA10B7BEF95A>
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:info@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>.
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
